• These cookies store data such as online identifiers (including IP address and device identifiers) along with the information used to provide the function.
• The information is used to try to make the Sites, emails, and newsletters, and the advertising displayed on them and other websites more relevant to your interests.
• For instance, when you visit the Sites, these targeting cookies are used by third party providers for remarketing purposes to allow them to show you advertisements for our products when you visit other websites on the internet.
• Our third party providers may collect and combine information collected through the Sites, emails, and newsletters with other information about your visits to other websites and apps over time, if those websites and apps also use the same providers.
